net.wimpi.modbus.io
Interface ModbusSerialTransport

All Superinterfaces:
ModbusTransport
All Known Implementing Classes:
ModbusASCIITransport, ModbusRTUTransport
public interface ModbusSerialTransport
extends ModbusTransport

Interface extending the ModbusTransport interface to contract methods necessary for serial transport implementations.

Version:
1.1 (08/06/2004)
Author:
Dieter Wimberger, John Charlton

Method Detail

prepareStreams

public void prepareStreams(java.io.InputStream in,
                           java.io.OutputStream out)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Prepares the input and output streams to be used for reading from and writing to.

Parameters:
in - the input stream to be read from.
out - the output stream to write to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O related error occurs.

isEcho

public boolean isEcho()
Tests if echo mode is on.

Returns:
true if echo mode on, false otherwise.

setEcho

public void setEcho(boolean b)
Sets the echo mode flag.

Parameters:
b - true if echo mode on, false otherwise.
